name: Alex
message: Adoption gave me the chance to find family in two worlds. National Adoption Month reminds me of connection and belonging.

name: Tracy
message: Every year I light a candle for my birth family and another for the one who raised me. Adoption is love in both directions.

name: Daniela
message: Adoption gave me new roots and new wings. This month is about honoring both sides of my story.

name: Oksana
message: National Adoption Month reminds me that love crosses oceans and names. We all carry our stories differently, but proudly.

name: James
message: Adoption is a journey, not a single event. Every day I keep learning who I am, and where I came from.
